name: "Everything" Seasoning Phyllo Crackers
author: France C
summary: These phyllo crackers have a delicate, flaky texture with a buttery flavor. Bagel seasoning can be found at most major retailers or you can make your own. These can be a little finicky to make at first, but once you get the hang of it, you will be hooked!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cut 2 sheets of parchment paper to fit on a baking sheet
Place 1 sheet of parchment on a flat work surface
Gently place 1 sheet of phyllo dough on top
Brush lightly with butter right up to the edges, being careful not to tear the sheet
Place another sheet of phyllo on top
Press down to remove any air pockets, and brush with butter
On the 5th sheet, brush with egg white instead of butter
Sprinkle with 1/2 of the bagel seasoning
Cut the phyllo into 40 squares, or into the shape of your choice, using a pizza cutter
Slide the whole parchment sheet onto the baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 6 to 8 minutes
Keep a close eye on them, as they tend to brown quickly
Remove parchment sheet from baking sheet and let cool
Let cool and serve immediately, or store at room temperature in a sealed container
